sentences.english: Emperor Qianlong visited the Pomegranate Garden, paying court to Pomegranate Blossom Fairy.
sentences.chinese: 乾隆微服私访石榴园，向榴花仙女求爱。

sentences.english: He was very distressed has been no answer, so incognito travel.
sentences.chinese: 他很苦闷一直没有答案，于是便微服私访。

sentences.english: Weifu Sifang was popular not only in ancient but in modern China.
sentences.chinese: 无论在中国古代还是当下，微服私访现象都较为常见。

sentences.english: Incognito plays "Nights Over Egypt" live in Seoul.
sentences.chinese: 微服私访次在埃及居住在汉城的夜。

sentences.english: The premier often visits supermarket or department stores in ordinary dress.
sentences.chinese: 总理经常微服私访超市或百货商店。
